content: learn how to crochet a corner to corner moss stitch square motif - you can keep this square small for multiple motifs or keep going to make one large square blanket complete with its very own moss stitch border hook size s go up one size from your chosen yarn suggested size and at least 2 sizes larger for the border for my squares i used woll bee batik from wollbiene in the colourway pastel rainbow with a 6mm hook for the border i used paintbox chunky in white with a 8mm hook
